Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Banzai-Tron/Atma/Psuedo:::

::Banzai-Tron takes his foot off of Technosis, kneels down, and kisses her::
Banzai-Tron: It was fun baby!
::He totally ignored Trinity.  Atma and Psuedo run in after hearing the 
commotion::
Atma: What the pit?
::they see Technosis' body::
Psuedo: NOOOOO!
::He looks to Banzai-Tron::
Psuedo: Bastard!
Banzai-Tron: Damn, their boyfriends ALWAYS go after me.
Psuedo: For your information, that was my WIFE!
Banzai-Tron: Oh, so sorry.
::He fired at Psuedo.  In the end, Psuedo was looking like swiss cheese::
Atma: Alright, slaghead, no more innocent lives will be taken.
Banzai-Tron: Im sorry, but... no.
::He took out his knife and stabbed through Atma's heart.  Atma fell to the 
floor next to Psuedo::
Banzai-Tron: My work here is done.
::He walked out through the hole he made and flew back to the Iron Fist::

--part1_53.53aaa36.280f94de_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
